body_text:
I'm having trouble coming up with a good testing strategy here - for the moment this just makes the current tests pass.
The problem is that shield completes way too early in startup, so listening for a notification or for the pref to change will be far too late to really prove anything the existing test doesn't.
I suppose we could have the shield client execute a recipe that spins the event loop enough times that the test can see a notification? Or perhaps execute a recipe that flips a pref or something else that the test could verify? Any thoughts? :)
